conbody.p: As a supervisor, you can access the statuses of the lots and operations associated with a work order in the Current Status page of the application. You can also modify the lot number if you want to change the name of the lot.

The progress of work of all the serial numbers and operations indicates the overall status of a work order. In the application, the All Serial/Lots pane displays the statuses of the serial numbers, and the table in the Current Status page displays the statuses of the operations. During production, the status of a lot and an operation may differ as follows:
When a lot is put on hold, the status of the operation associated with that lot can be In Progress.
When a lot is scrapped, the operation associated with that lot can be cancelled.
